Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 116th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 2009...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Cincinnati on 5/15/2011 (Going to CHA: C R. Castro. Going to CIN: 3B J. Mier)...
Injured on 6/8/2011 with a Sprained Wrist, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/8/2014, off Chris Young (HOU)...
Injured on 9/11/2017 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/21/2019 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Injured on 5/25/2021 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 2021...
Injured on 6/2/2022 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
